System: Unknown

Objective: Make a cake

Log Entry 749

I came across a new system today. This one has a lot of planets, all different. I heard that this one actually has life within it? Not that it matters. I have an objective and I must complete it. Thankfully, I was able to fix my thrusters so now I should be able to better explore these planets. I hope this system has what I need. I really want that cake.

- Space Commander Beezleboop

-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-

This is the 2.0 version for my DIG 4715 class.

Updates:

  • The space to move between rooms are more open and noticeable.
  • You now have to collect the ingredients on each planet before you are able to continue on.
